Summary: Silver metallic to white orbs seen hovering in sky while driving home from work.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down western avenue in the city of chicago heading south. it was around 2:15pm when i was stopped at a light at chicago avenue. there at the intersection a silver\grey metallic object caught my eye in the west sky over the buildings. it seemed stationary and large. i thought it must be a plane that caught my eye because it was sunny and it was just a reflection. before, i could get a better look, traffic started moving and i really didnt think anything was out of the ordinary. when i got to grand avenue stopped at the light i again saw a silver\grey metallic object and it was shaped like a sphere and it was in the west sky just hovering. it was not a plane, a balloon or a helicopter. it had no lights, wings, windows, markings and it was not that high up. during this whole time regular commercial airliners\a traffic helicopter and birds where all seen too as any normal chicago sky looks. i thought wow!! then i figured it must be somewhere over the 290 expressway from my point of view. i kept watching and it did not move. traffic started flowing again and i did not see the object due to buildings and trying to pay attention in heavy traffic. when i got to the taylor street intersection i saw the same silver grey metallic sphere still hovering in the west sky. this metallic sphere at all times i saw it seemed like it was hovering just a couple blocks to the west of western avenue. i then past what seemed like i went under the object as i turned west on odgen avenue and did not see anything else of this object to either of my horizons or rear view mirror. i drove down odgen avenue to connect onto cicero avenue going south. while waiting to turn off odgen onto cicero i saw 1 white orb hovering over cicero avenue. as i turned onto cicero, i still saw the white orb and it floated near a small puffy cloud and then just hovered under it. this orb was too very low in the sky with all kinds of air traffic and birds. as i drove past this area i lost sight of the object.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around February 15th 2008
